page.title: 20SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content:
The Council dwellings in{Noel Hill {Road,}Cross Houses are in blocks of four flats. There are two at ground floor level and two above. Many of these are occupied by old age pensioners. Also in this road are a number of bungalows, the{Group {Dwellings,}which are occupied also by "evergreen" people. There is a wardens house nearby. They live independently but have the warden on call if necessary.
{THE DOMESDAY PROJECT:}compiled by {BERRINGTON C.E.SCHOOL}children and staff. Microcomputer worker - N.HARRIS (age 10). Thanks to:J.Barlow-p2, V.Venables-p5, E.Powis-p6, J.Rowney-p7, A.Fryer-p11, S.Roberts-p13, B.Oliver-p15, M.Challinor-p16, T.Giblin-p17, J.Hall-p19.
